biotools.summary: The MOSAIC bioacc application is a turn-key web tool providing bioaccumulation metrics (BCF/BMF/BSAF) from a toxicokinetic (TK) model fitted to accumulation-depuration data. It is designed to fulfil the requirements of regulators when examining applications for market authorization of active substances.

bioschemas.name: bioacc
